name: superpowers-chrome (obra)
description: [项目级] Claude Code plugin for direct Chrome browser control via DevTools Protocol - zero dependencies。来源: https://github.com/obra/superpowers-chrome

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Claude Code plugin for direct Chrome browser control via DevTools Protocol - zero dependencies

来源: https://github.com/obra/superpowers-chrome
语言: JavaScript
Stars: 181

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **Zero dependencies** - Built-in WebSocket, no npm install needed
- **Idiotproof API** - Tab index syntax (`0`, `1`, `2`) instead of WebSocket URLs
- **Platform-agnostic** - `chrome-ws start` works on macOS, Linux, Windows
- **17 commands** covering all browser automation needs
- **Complete documentation** with real-world examples

name: superpowers-chrome/mcp 模块
description: [模块级] superpowers-chrome 项目的 mcp 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/obra/superpowers-chrome

genes.title: mcp 模块说明
genes.content: Ultra-lightweight MCP server with a single `use_browser` tool. Perfect for minimal context usage with automatic page captures.
